00018 #include <iostream>
00019 #include <fstream>
00020 #include <stdexcept>
00021 #include <votca/ctp/qmtopology.h>
00022 #include "md2qm_observer.h"
00023 #include <votca/csg/csgapplication.h>
00024 
00025 using namespace std;
00026 using namespace votca::csg;
00027 using namespace votca::ctp;
00028 using namespace votca::tools;
00029 
00030 class CtpMapApp
00031     : public CsgApplication
00032 {
00033     string ProgramName() { return "ctp_map"; }
00034     void HelpText(ostream &out) {
00035         out << "Converts atomistic topology and trajectory into coarse-grained ones";
00036     }
00037 
00038     void Initialize();
00039     bool EvaluateOptions();
00040     void BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref);
00041 
00042     bool DoTrajectory() {return true;}
00043     bool DoMapping() {return true;}
00044 
00045 
00046 protected:
00047     // we have one observer
00048     MD2QMObserver _observer;
00049     Property _options;
00050     QMTopology _qmtopol;
00051 };
00052 
00053 namespace po = boost::program_options;
00054 
00055 void CtpMapApp::Initialize()
00056 {
00057     CsgApplication::Initialize();
00058     AddProgramOptions("Mapping options")
00059             ("segments,s", po::value<string>(), "  conjugated segment definitions")
00060             ("file,f", po::value<string>(), "  sqlite state file");
00061 }
00062 
00063 bool CtpMapApp::EvaluateOptions()
00064 {
00065     CsgApplication::EvaluateOptions();
00066     CheckRequired("segments");
00067     CheckRequired("file");
00068 
00069     _observer.setOut(OptionsMap()["file"].as<string>());
00070     _observer.Initialize(_qmtopol, _options);
00071 
00072     // add our observer that it gets called to analyze frames
00073     AddObserver(dynamic_cast<CGObserver*>(&_observer));
00074     return true;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void CtpMapApp::BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref)
00078 {
00079     _qmtopol.LoadListCharges(OptionsMap()["segments"].as<string>());
00080     CsgApplication::BeginEvaluate(top, top_ref);
00081 }
00082 
00083 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00084 {
00085     CtpMapApp app;
00086     return app.Exec(argc, argv);
00087 }
